articles.content:

articles.title: Disney Plus free trial ends ahead of Hamilton premiere - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The sudden change comes only weeks out from two of the most highly-anticipated releases on the service since it launched.
articles.content:
One of Australias most prominent streaming services has ended its free trial promotion for new subscribers.
Disney Plus seven-day trial option vanished from its website last week.

articles.title: Carlos Ruiz Zafón obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Author of the bestselling literary thriller The Shadow of the Wind, set in 1940s Barcelona
